Class Commands

java.lang.Object
classes.Commands
public class Commands extends Object
The Commands class handles all player interactions with a pet. It manages which commands are currently enabled, and executes logic for feeding, playing, gifting, exercising, sleeping, and vet visits. It also monitors and updates the pet's vital statistics and changes states based on thresholds (e.g., sleep, hunger, happiness, health).
Version:
1.0
Author:
Darsh Srikanth

    • Commands

      public Commands(Pet controlPet)
      Constructs a new Commands controller for the specified pet.
      Parameters:
      controlPet - the pet this Commands object will manage

  • Method Details

    • isDisabled

      public boolean isDisabled(int command)
      Checks if a command is currently disabled.
      Parameters:
      command - the command ID
      Returns:
      true if disabled, false if enabled

    • checkStat

      public int checkStat(int stat)
      Returns the value of the specified stat from the pet.
      Parameters:
      stat - the stat type (e.g. health, hunger)
      Returns:
      the current stat value

    • disableCommand

      public void disableCommand(int command)
      Disables the specified command so the player can no longer use it.
      Parameters:
      command - the command ID to disable

    • enableCommand

      public void enableCommand(int command)
      Enables the specified command so the player can use it.
      Parameters:
      command - the command ID to enable

    • feed

      public void feed(int foodNum)
      Feeds the pet with a food item based on the player's choice.
      Parameters:
      foodNum - the selected food item (0=carrot, 1=Shrimp, 2=fish)

    • giveGift

      public void giveGift(int giftNum)
      Gives a gift to the pet and increases its happiness based on the item.
      Parameters:
      giftNum - the selected gift (0=Coral, 1=Message, 2=Pearl)

    • putToBed

      public void putToBed()
      Sends the pet to bed and triggers the sleep state.

    • vet

      public void vet()
      Takes the pet to the vet, restoring 50 health and triggering a cooldown.

    • play

      public void play()
      Plays with the pet, restoring health and triggering a cooldown.

    • exercise

      public void exercise()
      Exercises the pet, increasing health while reducing hunger and sleep.

    • foodEffect

      public void foodEffect(FoodItem foodItem)
      Applies the effects of a specific food item based on pet type.
      Parameters:
      foodItem - the food item to apply

    • declineHappiness

      public void declineHappiness()
      Decreases the pet's happiness based on decay rate. If in the hungry state, happiness decays 25% faster.

    • updateVitals

      public void updateVitals()
      Updates the pet's vital statistics and handles transitions between states such as sleep, angry, hungry, or dead.
